text: |Relevant Permissions|PA/13/01276 (and subsequent amendments) – outline permission for comprehensive mixed-use redevelopment including residential, business, commercial, and community uses (including a school). Included detailed permission for plots A, B, and C. PA/16/02851 – reserved matters for plot D. PA/19/00766 – reserved matters for Plot E, the secondary school. PA/19/01684 – reserved matters for plot F . PA/22/02666 – reserved matters for plot G.|
